21850.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「…:
I'm so nervous about this military meeting. I wonder what Dura-kun has found out about the revival of

21851.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「始: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>It looks like it's starting.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21852.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そ:

classified military discussion!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21853.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ま:

21854.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「…:

21855.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>And then we came upon a frightening
fact about the resurgence of Quava

21856.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「恐: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>A frightening fact.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21857.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「天:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>In the Tianmai Revelation, it is
written.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21858.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「…:
Long ago, Kukulkannibal emerged from the deep darkness and reigned over the land of Dolworm. He brought misfortune
and suffering to his people.

21859.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「天:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Kukulkannibal will never perish. When
healed in the underworld, he will
return to this world again.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21860.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そ:
And, with the grudge and curse of a previous life, he will take on an even stronger body, giving us endless
despair.

21861.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Oh, no. You mean that Quava Luna is
coming back with more power? To this
Dolworm!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21862.<start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>「な: <start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>Oh my god. Is Dolworm cursed?<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21863.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そ: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes. It has begun. A chain of despair.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21864.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ク:

21865.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>There is only one way to escape this
crisis.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21866.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「や:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>If we cannot destroy his body, our
only recourse is to seal

21867.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>In fact, even before Quava Luna

21868.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>I see. So it's sealed. But, Dura-kun.

21869.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「封:

21870.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そ:
And if you put Zekir's Holy Stake, which contains the power of a seal, into his chest, you can seal Kwaba
Luna in the depths of the earth.

21871.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ゼ:

21872.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「王:

21873.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「<:

21874.<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「…:

21875.<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura-kun, that's great. I'm sure that
